Topic.Title: New Game Book! (Steeleye and the Lost Magic)

Posts.EditableText:
I recently finished transcribing an out of print game book I have called Steeleye and the Lost Magic (out of print since 1987). If anyone wants to give it a read, you can access it here: [url:38wp7gno]http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/682/[/url:38wp7gno]

If you do, please be on the lookout for any spelling mistakes, misplaced punctuation, etc and mention them here. I typed the whole thing out while looking at the book so I might have made some typos and I'd like to get them fixed. I'm in the process of adding the images from the book now, and once that's done and any typos are fixed I will be listing the book publicly.

[b:38wp7gno]GAME NOTE:[/b:38wp7gno]
It's possible to just read through to the end of the book without solving any of the puzzles as the book was originally designed as a contest book where you'd have to enter the secret word on an entry form and mail it in. Try to challenge yourself to solve the puzzles and figure out the secret word for yourself. Even 20+ years later I still find it a bit of a challenge.
